default.shortDescription: Code Software makes it easy to monitor, analyze, record and report on the performance of just about any aspect of your Teams environment.
default.featuredTitle: Add a layer of clarity and understanding to your Teams environment.
featuredParagraphs: We have the tools to analyze and manage call quality and service levels, raise productivity, increase user adoption, and plan with confidence across multiple elements of Teams for the highs and lows of a fast-moving business.

callToAction.title: The Clobba suite is available on a free 30 day trial
callToAction.description: Delivered either from the Code Cloud or in customer environments see firsthand the added value that Clobba can bring to a Teams environment .Contact us now on info@codesoftware.net or visit www.codesoftware.net
